command: Mount-DiskImage -ImagePath "C:\Temp\archive.iso"; $iso=(Get-DiskImage "C:\Temp\archive.iso" | Get-Volume).DriveLetter; $usb=(Get-Volume | Where-Object {$_.DriveType -eq 'Removable'} | Select-Object -First 1 -ExpandProperty DriveLetter); Copy-Item "$iso:\" "$usb:\Backup" -Recurse -Force; Dismount-DiskImage -ImagePath "C:\Temp\archive.iso"
explanation: Mounts a local ISO, copies its contents to a USB drive, and dismounts, populating the removable media with exfil content via a local mount.
rationale_steps: Mount a local disk image to access packaged data.
Determine both ISO and USB drive letters.
Copy all ISO contents to the USB and then dismount.
